name: Cloud Of Souls
description:
Cloud Of Souls is an online multiplayer game inspired by Zelda and Twitch Play Pokemon.

You play one of the numerous souls trapped inside a human body. Go on a quest to get your freedom back!

For a better experience, play with a download version.

This early alpha demo contains the main gameplay mechanics, online functions and multiple maps wiith enemies and traps.

This is not the final product. Cloud Of Souls is currently in developpement and this demo is here to show you the main experience of the game. Its success will help me keep the motivation to finish the game.
